languages.text: "Мои предки узрели раны, нанесенные душе во время поисков Крудараха и пыток Темных. Раны, не заживавшие многие недели, пока я не могла медитировать и погружаться в свой мир. И теперь они где-то здесь — залечивают, правят, латают. И ты, {name}... Тебя они тоже считают раной, что кровоточит в моей душе". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на вас виновато и обреченно.{/n} "Давай попробуем как и прежде — вытащим тебя из моего мира с помощью медита..."

"My ancestors beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you are one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we have done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita—"
languages.original_text: "Мои предки узрели раны, нанесенные душе во время поисков Крудараха и пыток Темных. Раны, не заживавшие многие недели, пока я не могла медитировать и погружаться в свой мир. И теперь они где-то здесь — залечивают, правят, латают. И ты, {name}... Тебя они тоже считают раной, что кровоточит в моей душе". {n}Ирлиэт смотрит на вас виновато и обреченно.{/n} "Давай попробуем как и прежде — вытащим тебя из моего мира с помощью медита..."

traits.locale_text: "My ancestors have beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari torture. The wounds that couldn't heal for many weeks while I couldn't meditate and dive into my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching up, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we've done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita..."

They also think you one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we've done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita..."

languages.text: “之前我在寻找克鲁达拉赫时，以及受到黑暗灵族折磨时，我的心灵受到了创伤。由于我当时无法沉浸冥想，这些伤口也一直无法愈合。我的先祖看到了这一切，他们正在我的世界里为我疗愈、补缀、修整。而你，{name}……他们认为你也是我灵魂中的流血的伤口。”{n}伊莉耶特看着你，阴沉的脸上满是愧疚之意。{/n}“我们可以试试我们之前试过的方法，试着靠冥想让你离开我的世——”
languages.original_text: "My ancestors beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you are one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we have done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita—"

traits.locale_text: “之前我在寻找克鲁达拉赫时，以及受到黑暗灵族折磨时，我的心灵受到了创伤。由于我当时无法沉浸冥想，这些伤口也一直无法愈合。我的先祖看到了这一切，他们正在我的世界里为我疗愈、补缀、修整。而你，{name}……他们认为你也是我灵魂中的流血的伤口。”{n}伊莉耶特看着你，阴沉的脸上满是愧疚之意。{/n}“我们可以试试我们之前试过的方法，试着靠冥想让你离开我的世——”

languages.text: «Mis ancestros contemplaron las heridas que la búsqueda de Crudarach y la tortura de los Drukhari infligieron en mi alma. Las heridas que no sanaron en las muchas semanas durante las que fui incapaz de meditar y sumergirme en mi mundo. Y ahora están aquí, en alguna parte; me curan, me restañan, me restablecen. Pero tú, {name}... A ti también te ven como una de las heridas sangrantes de mi alma». {n}Yrliet te mira con expresión pesimista y culpable.{/n} «Intentemos lo que ya hicimos en otra ocasión; sacarte de mi mundo usando la medita...».
languages.original_text: "My ancestors beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you are one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we have done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita—"

traits.locale_text: «Mis ancestros contemplaron las heridas que la búsqueda de Crudarach y la tortura de los Drukhari infligieron en mi alma. Las heridas que no sanaron en las muchas semanas durante las que fui incapaz de meditar y sumergirme en mi mundo. Y ahora están aquí, en alguna parte; me curan, me restañan, me restablecen. Pero tú, {name}... A ti también te ven como una de las heridas sangrantes de mi alma». {n}Yrliet te mira con expresión pesimista y culpable.{/n} «Intentemos lo que ya hicimos en otra ocasión; sacarte de mi mundo usando la medita...».

languages.text: « Mes ancêtres ont vu les blessures qu'a subies mon âme lors de ma quête de Crudarach et des tortures infligées par les Drukharis. Comme j'étais incapable de méditer ou de m'immerger dans mon monde intérieur, elles ont mis plusieurs semaines avant de commencer à cicatriser. Mes ancêtres s'affairent à accélérer le processus, soignant, nettoyant et recousant les lésions. Quant à vous, {name}... Ils considèrent que vous êtes vous aussi une blessure qui saigne dans mon âme. » {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard où se mêlent tristesse et culpabilité.{/n} « Faisons comme la dernière fois : essayez de quitter mon monde en commençant à médit... »
languages.original_text: "My ancestors beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you are one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we have done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita—"

traits.locale_text: « Mes ancêtres ont vu les blessures qu'a subies mon âme lors de ma quête de Crudarach et des tortures infligées par les Drukharis. Comme j'étais incapable de méditer ou de m'immerger dans mon monde intérieur, elles ont mis plusieurs semaines avant de commencer à cicatriser. Mes ancêtres s'affairent à accélérer le processus, soignant, nettoyant et recousant les lésions. Quant à vous, {name}... Ils considèrent que vous êtes vous aussi une blessure qui saigne dans mon âme. » {n}Yrliet vous adresse un regard où se mêlent tristesse et culpabilité.{/n} « Faisons comme la dernière fois : essayez de quitter mon monde en commençant à médit... »

languages.text: "Meine Ahnen haben die Wunden gesehen, die meine Seele bei der Suche nach Crudarach und der Folter durch die Drukhari erlitten hat. Die Wunden, die wochenlang nicht heilten, sodass ich nicht meditieren und in meine Welt eintauchen konnte. Und jetzt sind sie hier irgendwo – sie heilen, flicken, reparieren. Und Euch, {name} ... Euch halten sie auch für eine der Wunden, die in meiner Seele bluten." {n}Yrliet sieht dich düster und schuldbewusst an.{/n} "Lasst uns versuchen, was wir schon einmal getan haben – wir ziehen Euch aus meiner Welt mit Medita..."
languages.original_text: "My ancestors beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you are one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we have done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita—"

Die Wunden, die wochenlang nicht heilten, sodass ich nicht meditieren und in meine Welt eintauchen konnte. Und jetzt sind sie hier irgendwo – sie heilen, flicken, reparieren. Und Euch, {name} ... Euch halten sie auch für eine der Wunden, die in meiner Seele bluten." {n}Yrliet sieht dich düster und schuldbewusst an.{/n} "Lasst uns versuchen, was wir schon einmal getan haben – wir ziehen Euch aus meiner Welt mit Medita..."

languages.text: 「私の父祖は、クルダラの捜索とデュカーリの拷問で私の魂に負わされた傷を見ていた。その傷は、私が瞑想することも、自分の世界に没入することもできない間、何週間も癒えることはなかった。そしてその傷は今、このどこかで癒され、手当てされ、修復されている。そしてあなた、{name}…彼らもまた、あなたが私の魂の中で血を流している傷の一つだと考えている」{n}ユリエットは憂鬱そうな、後ろめたい表情であなたを見ている。{/n}「以前やったようにやってみよう。瞑想であなたを私の世界から引き出すのだ…」
languages.original_text: "My ancestors beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you are one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we have done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita—"

traits.locale_text: 「私の父祖は、クルダラの捜索とデュカーリの拷問で私の魂に負わされた傷を見ていた。その傷は、私が瞑想することも、自分の世界に没入することもできない間、何週間も癒えることはなかった。そしてその傷は今、このどこかで癒され、手当てされ、修復されている。そしてあなた、{name}…彼らもまた、あなたが私の魂の中で血を流している傷の一つだと考えている」{n}ユリエットは憂鬱そうな、後ろめたい表情であなたを見ている。{/n}「以前やったようにやってみよう。瞑想であなたを私の世界から引き出すのだ…」

languages.text: "Atalarım, Crudarach arayışı ve Drukhari işkencesi sırasında ruhumda açılan yaraları gördüler. Meditasyon yapamadığım ve dünyamın derinlerine dalamadığım uzun haftalar boyunca iyileşmeyen yaralara baktılar. Şimdi de buralarda bir yerdeler. İyileştiriyor, yamalıyor ve onarıyorlar. Sen, {name}... Senin de ruhumda kanayan yaralardan biri olduğunu düşünüyorlar." {n}Yrliet, kederli ve suçlu bir bakışla sana bakıyor.{/n} "Daha önce yaptığımızı tekrar deneyelim. Seni dünyamdan meditasyonla..."
languages.original_text: "My ancestors beheld the wounds inflicted on my soul during the search for Crudarach and the Drukhari's torture. The wounds that did not heal for many weeks while I was unable to meditate and immerse myself in my world. And they are somewhere here now — healing, patching, mending. And you, {name}... They also think you are one of the wounds bleeding inside my soul." {n}Yrliet looks at you with a gloomy, guilty look.{/n} "Let's try to do as we have done before — try and pull you out of my world with medita—"
